question: What programming software and/or code editor do you use?

answer.text: In almost all of my videos, youâ€™ll find me using the official  p5.js web editor or Visual Studio Code for JavaScript and The Processing Development environment for Processing (Java)! I walk through all of the details in the [Workflow Side Track](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRqwX-V7Uu6Zu_uqEA6NqhLzKLACwU74X). This was made in 2018 and needs some refreshing!
